name: Undersea(beta)
description:
So i guess you can imagine this is my first game, i made it in about 24 hours, tried to put all my Photoshop and Beepbox abilities together and tried to make something fun and challenging.

You are a Steampunk Diver with a bubble gun, on the depths of the ocean and Deep Sea Crabs want to kill so use you bubble gun to stop them.
